acceptOwnership().details: Accept ownership transfer (must be called by pendingOwner)

acceptTransfer(uint256).details: Accept a transfer request (Only destination address)

createProductToken(string,uint256,uint25.details: Create a new product token (Approved users only)

params._amount: Initial amount of tokens to mint
params._parentId: Parent product ID (0 if no parent)

returns._0: tokenId The ID of the newly created product token

createTransferRequest(uint256,address,ui.details: Create a transfer request (Approved users only)

returns._0: transferId The ID of the newly created transfer request
Array of all product token IDs

getApprovedUsersByRole(string).details: Get approved users by role (backward compatibility - returns first 100)

returns._0: addresses Array of addresses of approved users with the specified role

getApprovedUsersByRole(string,uint256,ui.details: Get approved users by role (Approved users only)

params._limit: Maximum number of results to return (max 100)

returns.addresses: Array of addresses of approved users with the specified role
returns.totalCount: Total number of approved users with the specified role

getPendingTransfers(address).details: Get all pending transfers for an address (backward compatibility - returns first 100)

params._address: Address to get pending transfers for

returns._0: Array of transfer IDs that are still pending

getPendingTransfers(address,uint256,uint.details: Get all pending transfers for an address (with pagination)

params._address: Address to get pending transfers for
params._limit: Maximum number of results to return (max 100)

returns.resultTransferIds: Array of transfer IDs that are still pending
returns.totalCount: Total number of pending transfers for the address

getTokenBalance(uint256,address).details: Get token balance for an address

getTokenTotalSupply(uint256).details: Get total supply of a token

getTokenTransactionHistory(uint256).details: Get transaction chain history for a product token (backward compatibility - returns first 100)

returns._0: Array of transfer IDs representing the transaction history

getTokenTransactionHistory(uint256,uint2.details: Get transaction chain history for a product token (with pagination)

params._limit: Maximum number of results to return (max 100)

returns.resultTransferIds: Array of transfer IDs representing the transaction history
returns.totalCount: Total number of transfers in history

getTotalProductTokens().details: Get total number of product tokens

getTotalUsers().details: Get total number of registered users

returns._0: True if user is approved, false otherwise
userId The ID of the newly registered admin
userId The ID of the newly registered user

rejectTransfer(uint256).details: Reject a transfer request (Only destination address)

params._userAddress: Address of the user to update

getApprovedUsersByRole(string,uint256,ui.notice: This function allows approved users to get a list of approved users         for a specific role, useful for transfer operations
